Update: I now have 400+ hours on this game and my statement hasn't changed. It's toxic af, 50% chance of meeting hackers and 90% chance of meeting someone that doesn't speak English. other than that, totally recommend the game if you want to get called a hacker for getting more than 2 kills each round

Great game. Love CSGO, had it for a long time. Only game I can come back to consistently and not get bored, and that's saying something since I prefer strategy and RPG games. Once you stop raging over every detail and get desensitized to the toxicity you can play this all day and enjoy it, and although I don't have that luxury often I love to enjoy it when I can and play CSGO nightly and weekly quite often. Great time killer or competitive game depending on who you are.
